channel.title: Oil on Anthropocene Timeline
channel.description: Recent content in Oil on Anthropocene Timeline

item.title: Black Gold
item.description: An essay about oil history, from its discovery to its importance in today’s civilization in all domains: industrial of course but also military, political and economical.

item.title: IEA World Energy Outlook reports
item.description: The IEAâ€™s flagship World Energy Outlook (WEO) is the most authoritative source of global energy analysis and projections. Updated annually to reflect the latest energy data, technology and market trends, and government policies, it explores a range of possible energy futures and their implications for energy security, access and emissions.
